known_issues: "Get started" and "Skip" buttons appear but do not function; navigation to the next page does not occur.

existing_features.title: Fix the onboarding screen so its action buttons work reliably: tapping/clicking "Next" must advance to the next onboarding step, "Get Started" must complete onboarding, and "Skip" must exit onboarding immediately.

Ensure that after onboarding completion (via "Get Started" or "Skip"), the app reliably renders the next screen instead of appearing stuck on the prior page; if needed, update the post-onboarding behavior to navigate to the Home route ("/") so users always land on a visible main page.

Fix any PWA/service-worker caching behavior that can cause client-side route transitions to show stale content (e.g., appearing to repeat the previous page) after deployments/updates, ensuring in-app navigation consistently renders the correct route content.

projectName: Fix onboarding Get Started/Skip buttons and forward navigation not updating pages
